wikitext.*:
'''The Fall of Gondolin''' refers to more than one concept:

* '''''[[The Fall of Gondolin]]''''', the [[2018]] publication covering the entire story and its history, including the 1984 chapter.
* [[Of Tuor and the Fall of Gondolin]], the twenty-third chapter in the [[1977]] book ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
* [[The Fall of Gondolin (chapter)]], the chapter in the [[1984]] book ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part Two]]'' covering the very first version of the story.
* [[The Lay of the Fall of Gondolin]], an unfinished poem included in ''[[The Lays of Beleriand]]''.

* The '''[[Fall of Gondolin]]''', the actual event itself about the downfall of [[Gondolin]] and the escape of [[Tuor]] and [[Idril]].
{{DEFAULTSORT:Fall of Gondolin, The (disambiguation)}}
